range.value: Integer values in the range -1 to -65536
range.registration_rule: delegated to the COSE Header Algorithm Parameters registry

record.name: delegated to the COSE Header Algorithm Parameters registry
record.label: -65536 to -1

record.name: CounterSignature0
record.description: Counter signature with implied signer and headers (Deprecated by )

record.name: kid context
record.description: Identifies the context for the key identifier

record.name: kcwt
record.description: A CBOR Web Token (CWT) containing a COSE_Key in a 'cnf' claim and possibly other claims. CWT is defined in . COSE_Messages is defined in .

record.name: kccs
record.description: A CWT Claims Set (CCS) containing a COSE_Key in a 'cnf' claim and possibly other claims. CCS is defined in .

record.name: CWT Claims
record.description: Location for CWT Claims in COSE Header Parameters.

record.name: typ (type)
record.description: Content type of the complete COSE object

record.name: sd_claims (TEMPORARY - registered 2026-01-16, expires 2027-01-16)
record.description: A list of selectively disclosed claims, which were originally redacted, then later disclosed at the discretion of the sender.

record.name: c5u (TEMPORARY - registered 2024-03-11, publication requested 2025-09-23)
record.description: URI pointing to a COSE_C509 containing an ordered chain of certificates

record.name: c5b (TEMPORARY - registered 2024-03-11, publication requested 2025-09-23)
record.description: An unordered bag of C509 certificates

record.name: c5c (TEMPORARY - registered 2024-03-11, publication requested 2025-09-23)
record.description: An ordered chain of C509 certificates

record.name: x5bag
record.description: An unordered bag of X.509 certificates

record.name: x5chain
record.description: An ordered chain of X.509 certificates

record.name: x5u
record.description: URI pointing to an X.509 certificate

record.name: sd_alg (TEMPORARY - registered 2026-01-16, expires 2027-01-16)
record.description: The hash algorithm used for redacting disclosures.

record.name: sd_aead_encrypted_claims (TEMPORARY - registered 2026-01-16, expires 2027-01-16)
record.description: A list of AEAD encrypted selectively disclosed claims, which were originally redacted, then later disclosed at the discretion of the sender.

record.name: sd_aead (TEMPORARY - registered 2026-01-16, expires 2027-01-16)
record.description: The AEAD algorithm used for encrypting disclosures.

record.name: payload-hash-alg
record.description: The hash algorithm used to produce the payload of a COSE_Sign1

record.name: preimage-content-type
record.description: The content-format number or content-type (media-type name) of data that has been hashed to produce the payload of the COSE_Sign1

record.name: payload-location
record.description: The string or URI hint for the location of the data hashed to produce the payload of a COSE_Sign1

record.name: x5ts
record.description: CBOR array of instances of COSE_CertHash

record.name: srCms
record.description: set of commitments and optional commitments qualifiers

record.name: sigPl
record.description: CBOR map for indicating the location where the signature was generated. It may contain an indication of the country, the locality, the region, a box number in a post office, the postal code, and the street address

record.name: srAts
record.description: CBOR map that may contain: an array of attributes that the signer claims to be in possession of, an array of attribute certificates (X.509 attribute certificates or other) issued to the signer, an array of signed assertions issued by a third party to the signer, or any combination of the three aforementioned CBOR arrays

record.name: adoTst
record.description: CBOR map that encapsulates one or more electronic time-stamps, generated before the signature production, and whose message imprint computation input is the COSE Payload of the CB-AdES signature

record.name: sigPId
record.description: CBOR map that identifies a certain signature policy and may contain the digest of the document defining this signature policy.

record.name: sigD
record.description: CBOR map that references data objects that are detached from the CB-AdES signature and that are collectively signed.

record.name: uHeaders
record.description: CBOR array that contains a number of CBOR elements that are placed within the array in the order they are incorporated into the CB-AdES signature

record.name: 3161-ttc
record.description: Timestamp Token per : Timestamp, Then COSE

record.name: 3161-ctt
record.description: Timestamp Token per : COSE, Then Timestamp

record.name: receipts
record.description: Priority ordered sequence of CBOR encoded Receipts

record.name: vds
record.description: Algorithm identifier for verifiable data structures, used to produce verifiable data structure proofs

record.name: vdp
record.reg: map key in COSE Verifiable Data Structure Proofs
record.description: Location for verifiable data structure proofs in COSE Header Parameters

registry.title: COSE Header Algorithm Parameters
registry.expert: Göran Selander, Derek Atkins, Sean Turner

record.name: x5u-sender
record.description: URI for the sender's X.509 certificate

record.name: x5t-sender
record.description: Thumbprint for the sender's X.509 certificate

record.description: Static public key identifier for the sender

record.description: ECDSA using P-521 curve and SHA-512

record.description: CBOR Object Signing Algorithm for ML-DSA-44

record.description: ECDSA using secp256k1 curve and SHA-256

record.description: Shared secret w/ HKDF and SHA-512

record.description: HMAC w/ SHA-256 truncated to 64 bits

range.value: Integer values in the range -65536 to -1
range.registration_rule: used for key parameters specific to a single algorithm delegated to the COSE Key Type Parameters registry

record.name: used for key parameters specific to a single algorithm delegated to the COSE Key Type Parameters registry
record.label: -65536 to -1

record.name: kid
record.description: Key identification value - match to kid in message

record.name: alg
record.description: Key usage restriction to this algorithm

record.name: Base IV
record.description: Base IV to be XORed with Partial IVs

registry.title: COSE Key Type Parameters
registry.expert: Göran Selander, Derek Atkins, Sean Turner

record.name: crv
record.description: EC identifier -- Taken from the "COSE Elliptic Curves" registry

record.name: crv
record.description: EC identifier -- Taken from the "COSE Elliptic Curves" registry

record.name: p
record.description: the prime factor p of n

record.name: q
record.description: the prime factor q of n

record.name: qInv
record.description: qInv is the CRT coefficient q^(-1) mod p

record.name: r_i
record.description: a prime factor r_i of n, where i >= 3

record.name: t_i
record.description: the CRT coefficient t_i = (r_1 * r_2 * ... * r_(i-1))^(-1) mod r_i

record.name: pub
record.description: Public key for HSS/LMS hash-based digital signature

record.name: t-values
record.description: List of T-values, entries in F_q

record.name: matrix 1
record.description: NxN Matrix of entries in F_q in column-major form

record.name: matrix 2
record.description: NxN Matrix of entries in F_q in column-major form
